docs.text: Welcome ! I graduated from IIT Madras in 2005. Every developer has a story.. And there is a story about every app... I'd like to share my stories, and my apps... Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
